name: Dark Cloud | 10 Question Video Games Multiple Choice Quiz

questions.text: What is the main character's name?
questions.explanation:
Toan.

	Toan is a young boy who is given the power to unlock Atla by the Fairy King. It is his job to reassemble the towns that have been destroyed by the Dark Genie and to defeat the Dark Genie.

questions.text: Some of Xiao's weapons include axes and large frozen tunas.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Goro handles axes and even has a large frozen tuna as a weapon! Xiao has slingshots, which makes her ideal for defeating enemies from far away. One of her weapons, Steve, is a slingshot that will talk to you, giving information on enemies and making jokes.

questions.text: In Queens, where does Sheriff Wilder request the police station be moved to?
questions.explanation:
Close to King's house.

	Sheriff Wilder thinks that King may be up to some illegal activity, so he has to keep an eye on him. Queens is a merchant town and the third town that the player, as Toan, must reassemble using Atla.

questions.text: Which character had a famous hunter for a father?
questions.explanation:
Goro.

	Goro is from Matataki village, a village where hunting animals is taken very seriously. Denizens of the village wear the hides of the strongest animal they've killed to show their prominence, and Goro wears a bear outfit. His father, Fudoh, slew the great white tiger, but died fighting a large snake.

questions.text: Leveling up your character is an important aspect of "Dark Cloud".
questions.explanation:
False.

	In "Dark Cloud", the characters do not level up, the weapons do! Be careful though, a weapon can be used only so many times before it breaks. Before that happens, the player needs to use Repair Powders, which makes the weapon good as new.

questions.text: When a weapon has been upgraded five times, you can perform an action called a 'status break'. A status break allows you to attach the weapon onto another weapon. What percent of the weapon's power can be attached?
questions.explanation:
Sixty percent.

	A weapon can be upgraded when its Absorption points are full. Absorption points are gained upon defeating enemies. When a weapon is upgraded, it does more damage and is more durable.

True.

	Known as Nolun village in the PAL version, it is here that the game starts. Toan's fellow villagers are only to happy to give you useful items when the player fully rebuilds each house.

Fudoh.

	Fudoh is Goro's deceased father. Ruby joins you in Queens, Ungaga joins you in Muska Racka and Osmond joins you in Yellow Drops. Ungaga uses polearms, like spears and tridents, and Osmond uses lasers, machine guns and even a flamethrower!

questions.text: The player can fish in three locations throughout the game.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The player, as Toan, can fish in four locations throughout the game. Fishing points are awarded upon reeling in a fish. To fish, a fishing pole and bait must be in the player's inventory.

questions.text: Each playable character can increase their defense rating by eating a special item. Which food item does Xiao eat?
questions.explanation:
Fish Candy.

	Xiao is a catgirl that joins Toan in Norune village. Toan eats fluffy doughnuts, Goro eats grass cakes, and Osmond eats carrot cookies. Xiao can jump great distances that Toan can not.
